name: Super Cyborg Cat
description:
- A challenging platforming infinite runner with a retro pixel art style! 

- Randomly built, A new experience every time you play!

- Color changing mechanic, Switch between white and black to collect pickups of the same color!

- Unlockable costumes!

- Special pickups provide a reward for riskier maneuvers! 

- All original art, animations, sound effects and music done in an retro style!
